**Smart Toothbrush**: A toothbrush that integrates with a smartphone app. The brush tracks brushing habits and provides feedback on brushing time, pressure, and missed areas. It can even remind users to brush at specific times of the day. Confidence Score: 0.9

**Electric Toothbrush with UV-C Light**: An advanced electric toothbrush that uses UV-C light technology to kill bacteria in the mouth, providing an extra layer of oral hygiene protection. Confidence Score: 0.85

**Customizable Oral Care Kit**: A kit that includes a variety of interchangeable heads (for different cleaning needs like whitening, gum care, etc.) and toothpaste flavors. Users can choose their kit based on their oral health needs. Confidence Score: 0.9

**Eco-Friendly Bamboo Toothbrush**: A toothbrush made from bamboo, which is biodegradable and sustainable. It also features soft bristles made from recycled materials, promoting eco-friendly oral hygiene practices. Confidence Score: 0.8

**Wireless Charging Toothbrush Stand**: A toothbrush stand that wirelessly charges the toothbrush while it's not in use. This reduces clutter and ensures the brush always has power when needed. Confidence Score: 0.9
